metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18207 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The Wave_read._read_fmt_chunk function in Lib/wave.py in Python through 3.6.4 does not ensure a nonzero channel value, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero and exception) via a crafted wav format audio file. NOTE: the vendor disputes this issue because Python applications "need to be prepared to handle a wide variety of exceptions."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is disputed, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
python3.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
python3.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
